Ward–Discard a card. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player discards a card.)[/i]
[i]Rend Heaven [/i]– Whenever Camilla, Nohrian Basara attacks, tap target creature defending player controls. Camilla gets +X/+0 where X is that creature's power.
